page.title: 17Organisations in Codsall
page.content: Codsall Christian Aid Group is a small support group. We are closely involved with Christian Aid Week each year. Last year we collected over 200 blankets to send to refugees in Eritrea; we also work to promote development education, chiefly by arranging events in "One World Week" each October. Codsall Women's Institute was formed in 1920 when Codsall was truly a village. The aim of the movement is to improve the quality of rural life by the fuller education of the country woman. Member- ship has fluctuated from 42-90 and is now around 30. We have classes or talks or demonstrations on craft work,cookery good health, women in society and present day problems. We raise money for overseas projects. At home we support many local charities.
